synergyviewcore.timebar.component

Interface TimeScaleBar.TimeScaleListener

  • Enclosing class:
    TimeScaleBar

    public static interface TimeScaleBar.TimeScaleListener
    The listener interface for receiving timeScale events. The class that is interested in processing a timeScale event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addTimeScaleListener method. When the timeScale event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    TimeScaleEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void timeScaleChanged(double newPixelsPerSecond)
      Time scale changed.

      • timeScaleChanged

        Time scale changed.
        Parameters:
        newPixelsPerSecond - the new pixels per second
